Source code for users.views

from django.shortcuts import render, redirect
from django.contrib.auth import login, authenticate
from django.contrib import messages
from .forms import UserRegistrationForm

# Create your views here.

[docs]def home(request):
    return render(request, 'user/home.html')



[docs]def register(request):
    """
    This function lets you know you created a account
    
    """
    if request.method == 'POST':
        form = UserRegistrationForm(request.POST)
        if form.is_valid():
            form.save()
            
            messages.success(request, f'Your account has been created. You can log in now!')
            return redirect('login')
    
    else:
        form = UserRegistrationForm()
    
    context = {'form': form}
    return render(request, 'user/register.html', context)
    """
    The above else statement takes you to the register form
    """


[docs]def about_us(request):
    return render(request, 'user/about_us.html')



[docs]def login(request):
    if request.method == 'POST':
        form = UserRegistrationForm(request.POST)
        if form.is_valid():
            form.save()
            return redirect('home')
